sentence: How do you circumcised a whale? four skin divers
explanation: explanation: Skin refers to the outer covering of an organism and skin also refers to a cured hide

sentence: What do you call a statue of jesus made out of cigarettes? holy smokes.

first_new_sentence: The smoke from the fire alarmed everyone in the building.
second_new_sentence: She decided to smoke her first cigarette at the party.

sentence: What do you call emotions of a dna? gene expressions
